version_description: Fixed iOS 9.1 issue when saving equipment connection type.
Fixed issues with Facebook post and Twitter tweet.

Fixed issues when running with iOS 10.
Added support for Chromecast connection to TV.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Fixed issue with iPhone 7 crash.
